intro: Master machines and build a thriving construction empire.
description:
Take the reins of your own construction company and transform a small contracting gig into an industry-leading empire. In Construction Sim: City and Road Builder, every job is a stepping stone — from hauling materials and clearing sites to assembling massive bridges, paving roads, and even installing wind turbines.

Master the art of construction with a deep set of mechanics:
- Dynamic Contract System – Tackle jobs of varying complexity, from simple one-star deliveries to multi-stage mega projects.
- Company Progression – Upgrade your business to unlock advanced contracts, features, and bigger challenges.
- Specialized Machinery – Purchase, maintain, and operate a full fleet of equipment, from excavators and cranes to dump trucks and compactors.
- Realistic Operations – Experience authentic physics for loading, leveling, compacting, and transporting.
- Equipment Management – Match the right machines to each job, and keep them in shape with a detailed repair system.

With clean, realistic visuals and an atmosphere that captures the everyday grind of the construction world, Construction Sim: City and Road Builder delivers the satisfying journey from rookie contractor to industry titan.
